name: Grip

description: 15% Chance on critical hit to summon a Twister that seeks out nearby foes, dealing  Ethereal damage per second as direct damage but may not crit.

name: Hellfire
description: 15% Chance on critical hit to summon Hellfire over your foe, dealing up to  Ethereal damage per strike. Deals direct damage but may not crit.

name: Crit Heal
description: 5% chance on critical hits to restore  health

name: Enrage
description: 5% chance on critical hits to increase the base Attack Speed of all skills by  for 5 seconds

name: Burst
description: 35% chance on critical hits to cause an explosion dealing  Ethereal damage

name: Kill Hoarder
description: chance for foes to burst out extra crystals upon death

name: Kill Explode
description: chance to explode foes upon their death, dealing up to 30% of their maximum health as Ethereal damage to other nearby foes

name: Kill Pickups
description: chance to spawn additional health and mana pickups on kill

name: Kill Damage
description: 15% chance to increase Damage by  for 10 seconds after killing a foe. This effect may stack up to 5 times

name: Kill Restoration
description: 15% chance to increase Health Regeneration by  for 10 seconds after killing a foe. This effect may stack up to 5 times

description: 15% chance to increase Mana Regeneration by  for 10 seconds after killing a foe. This effect may stack up to 5 times

description: 5% chance to heal for  of Maximum Health after killing a foe

description: 15% chance to increase Movement Speed by  for 10 seconds after killing a foe. This effect may stack up to 5 times

description: Health- and Mana Regeneration for 5 seconds after gibbing a foe

description: Damage for 5 seconds after gibbing a foe

description: 5% chance to heal for  of Maximum Health after gibbing a foe

description: chance to root and immobilize attacker for 3 seconds when struck

description: chance to cause attackers to run away in fear for up to 3 seconds when struck

description: 5% chance to release a nova of Deathblasts dealing  Shadow damage when struck

name: Ground Effect Resistance
description: reduced damage from harmful ground effects

name: Indirect Damage Resistance
description: reduced damage from indirect sources and debuffs

name: Healing from all sources
description: increased Healing from all sources

name: Boomring
description: Foes explode upon death, dealing  of their Maximum Health as Ethereal damage to all foes within 3 meters.

name: Jeopardy
description: Your Critical Hit Chance is locked to 5%, and for each attack that lands a hit you gain  Critical Hit Damage for 3 seconds, until you reach 10 stacks. After reaching 10 stacks, your Critical Hit Chance is locked to 100% for 3 seconds, after which it resets.

name: Choker
description: Health and Mana pickups no longer instantly restore Health and Mana. Instead each pickup increases Health Regeneration, Mana Regeneration, Health on Hit, and Mana on Hit by  for 10 seconds. Stacks 5 times and is affected by Pickup Strength.

name: Heartstone
description: Increases Health by  of total Resistances, and sets all Resistances to 0.

name: Pathmakers
description: Your Health Regeneration and Mana Regeneration are increased by  of your Movement Speed.

name: Extra-Ordinary
description: For each item of Rare quality or lower, all your Damage Element stats are increased by .

name: Elementium
description: All your Resistances except your highest Resistance are increased by  of your highest Resistance.

name: Hurtblocker
description: Using any Utility skill other than Shield Dance will also trigger Shield Dance. In addition, the effect of Shield Dance is  stronger.

name: Dodgeclaw
description: Utility skills also restore  of Maximum Health and Mana.

name: Meteora
description: Casting Soul Warp now pulls all nearby enemies together at your initial position and casts Meteor on them, dealing  increased damage.

name: Tumblespike
description: Tumble, Escape, and Trapflip increase all Resistances by  for 5 seconds.

name: Fleetstride
description: You become immune to spike traps, can walk through objects and foes, and cannot be slowed or immobilized.

name: Shield Maiden
description: Adds  of your Block Chance to Shield skill damage, but removes your ability to block.

name: Blessed Raiment
description: damage with all Magic skills.

name: Iactus
description: Shield Throw, Shield Spiral, and Shield Boomerang release several fragments on each hit, dealing  of the damage dealt to the foe.

name: Aegis
description: chance to cast rank 5 Blessing when you block an attack. 1 second cooldown.

name: Book of Purity
description: Blessing and Healing Touch also cast rank 5 Purify when cast.

name: Heart of Grace
description: Grace shields for  increased health.

name: Starfell
description: Reduces the cooldown of Star Fall, Shattering Shield, and Shooting Stars by .

name: Iapetus
description: Adds  increased chance for Celerity to trigger.

name: Jupiter
description: Increases the range of Magnetic Orbs, Magnetic Field, and Blade Overload by .

name: Illumine
description: Holy Light, Open Heavens, and Divine Salvo deal  increased damage.

name: Tome of Wrath
description: Avenger deals  additional damage.

name: Tome of Vengeance
description: Wearing this Tome grants permanent Dancing Blades at max rank. In addition, the Dancing Blades may now trigger Sharp Steel on hit, based on  of damage inflicted.

name: Tome of Condemnation
description: Condemnation has a  chance to cast Ember when triggered.

name: Tome of Redemption
description: Blinding Light has a  additional chance to stun.

name: Claws of Gluttony
description: Hunger triggers on foes with  more Health.

name: Amp Claw
description: Amplified deals  additional damage.

name: Wrath Claw
description: Explosive Punch, Flame Roll, and Dragon Breath reset their cooldown when Explosive Manoeuvres triggers.

name: Wyrmtooth
description: Frost Winds and Cooling Off have an additional  chance to trigger.

name: Bad Boys
description: Boulder, Rock Pound, and Shattering Roar have an additional  range.

name: Arsonists
description: Dragon Burn deals an additional  of the initial damage dealt.

name: Thunder Claps
description: Blessing of The Skies now also increases Lightning Damage by .

name: Icebergs
description: Shattering Cold instead releases large ice chunks dealing  increased damage and in a 2 meter radius.

name: Wrathborn
description: Generate  rage per second at all times. Rage never fades.

name: Helm of Might
description: Rage based passive skills are now  stronger.

name: Titan Ring
description: The Knockback Chance stat increases Damage by the same percentage, but will no longer trigger knockbacks. In addition, active skills with a knockback effect no longer cause knockback, and have their base damage increased by  for each meter of knockback they normally do. Does not affect Utility skills.

name: Despair
description: All attacks deal  increased damage to foes who are slowed or immobilized.

name: Quadruplets
description: Summons four skull companions, each skull representing one of the four elements available in the skill trees. The skulls have  damage of their chosen element and their attacks will trigger player on-hit effects.

name: Skull Mask
description: For each non-set item, Damage is increased by .

name: Weyrick's Crown
description: For each Gem socketed into worn equipment, base Health, Mana, and Damage is increased by .

name: Royal Armor
description: of your Health on Hit and Mana on Hit are now added to Health Regeneration and Mana Regeneration respectively, however both Health on Hit and Mana on Hit are removed.

name: Terra Nova
description: Reduces the cooldown of Arrow Hail, Empowered Shot, and Tornado by .

name: Marruu's Rose
description: Symbiosis has a  increased effect.

name: Thunderstring
description: Lightning Burns deals an additional  damage per second.

name: Stormdraw
description: Hail Storm, Air Freeze, and Blast Arrow have a  increased radius.

name: Wind Razor
description: Splinter deals an additional  damage.

name: Nature's Barbs
description: The damage of Vine Shot, Bramble Vine, Bramble Storm, and Vine Blast is increased by  of the Warden's Thorns stat, and Thorns damage turns into Poison.

name: Thunderpoint
description: Static jumps to up to  additional targets.

name: Snowpiercer
description: Snow Blast and Hail have an additional  chance to trigger.

name: Book of Boils
description: Bursting Boils has an additional  meter range.

name: Book of Duplus
description: Doublecast has a  extra chance to trigger.

name: Book of Destruction
description: Combustion has a  extra chance to trigger.

name: Book of Desecration
description: Desecration has  increased range.

name: Frostborne
description: Cold Embrace lowers the cooldown by an additional .

name: Hellstaff
description: Inferno, Meteor, and Fire Storm have  increased radius.

name: Kennerth
description: Bone Splinters deals an additional  damage per second.

name: Bile Rod
description: Soul Power adds an additional  damage per Soul.

name: Golden Guard
description: 10% chance when hit to release 3 Holy Bolts, each dealing  of your Thorns damage as Holy damage to random nearby foes.

name: Unbreakable Bond
description: Reduces all damage taken by Companions by .

name: Life Guard
description: Reduces damage taken from all sources, including indirect, by .

name: Infernal Horns
description: Infernal Demon summons  additional demons.

name: Firebreather
description: Dragon Breath now summons  dragons circling the Berserker.

name: Brutal Stompers
description: Removes the cooldown and mana cost from Leap, Dragon Leap, and Arctic Leap.

name: Packleader
description: Wolfpack also summons an Alpha Wolf of the same rank. In addition, all wolves deal  increased damage.

name: Forest Embrace
description: Bloom reduces all damage taken by  for 5 seconds when triggered.

name: Storm Pendant
description: Lightning Arrow and Thunder Orb spawns a rank  Nimbus on impact.

name: Hermes
description: You become immune to both knockback and movement impairing effects.

name: Nimble
description: You become immune to movement impairing effects.

name: Health Injection
description: Restores  Health instantly when falling below 30% Maximum Health. 10 second cooldown.

name: Mana Injection
description: Restores  Mana instantly when falling below 30% Maximum Mana. 10 second cooldown.

name: Skyshard
description: Adds a 5% chance on hit to strike the foe for  of the damage dealt as Lightning damage.

name: Smolder
description: Foes killed burn the ground, dealing  Fire damage per second for 3 seconds in a small radius.

name: Elementium Stone
description: Dealing direct damage to a foe places an Elemental Attunement on them, increasing the direct damage they take by . Each element used places a separate Attunement. Lasts 7 seconds.

name: Hydra Scale
description: Adds a 5% chance on being hit to increase Health Regeneration by  for 3 seconds.

name: Death List
description: Adds a 10% chance on kill to raise a Skeleton Warrior that will fight for the Warlock for up to 1 minute. A maximum of  Skeletons can be controlled, and each Skeleton has 50% of the Warlock's Health, and 30% of his Shadow Damage.

name: Lich's Touch
description: All Frost skills have a  chance on cast to also cast Curse of Doom over your target.

name: Pestilence
description: Bursting Boils has an additional  chance to trigger, and the Pestilence passive skill now applies Infection instead, as if applied by the Warlock, however at 25% efficiency.

name: Hellstone
description: The Warlock now has a  chance to steal Souls on hit. 0.5 seconds cooldown.

name: Band of Nature
description: damage with all Nature skills.

name: Helm o' War
description: All Shout skills also cast War Cry.

name: Flamebound
description: All Fire skills also cast Embershield. Embershield increases Health Regeneration by  while active. This effect is tripled if the Berserker is on fire.

name: Pain Bolts
description: Each time any Arrow passes through a foe because of Overdraw, the damage of the Arrow is increased by .

name: Stormdweller
description: Storm skills cost  less mana.

name: Brimstone
description: damage with all Sorcery skills.

name: Vindicator
description: Thorns damage is dealt as a nova, dealing  increased damage in a 2.5 meter radius.

name: Serenity
description: All Archery skills attack with  increased attack speed.

name: Spectral Armor
description: increased Evasion and Damage Reduction.

name: Crown of Justice
description: increased range and effectiveness of all Auras.

name: Hardcore
description: Any attack that would kill the wearer will instead restore them to  Maximum Health. This effect can only occur once per 3 minutes.

name: Ferocity
description: When using any skill, there's a chance equal to  of the current missing Health percentage to instantly reset the cooldown of the skill. This chance never goes below 10%.

name: Hydrascale Boots
description: Health Regeneration is increased by  of missing Health percentage.

name: Kingsrock
description: increased effect of all Gems.

name: Meteorite Ring
description: increased damage of all Satellite enchants.

name: Challenger's Charm
description: Shrine effects are doubled, but they also always spawn a Champion.

name: Vampire Lord's Cape
description: The wearer is healed for  of all mana spent or drained.

name: Gravity
description: All satellites spawn in pairs and deal  increased damage.

name: Icecrown
description: Frost Spear is also fired from any active Frost Satellite enchants when cast.

name: Health Injection Mk2
description: Restores  Health instantly when falling below 30% Maximum Health. 10 second cooldown.

name: Mana Injection Mk2
description: Restores  Mana instantly when falling below 30% Maximum Mana. 10 second cooldown.

name: Rahlence's Resolution
description: Adds a  chance on kill to grant a random Shrine buff that lasts for 15 seconds.

name: Saboteur
description: Breaking breakable objects increases Movement Speed by 1%, stacking up to  times. Effect lasts 10 seconds.

name: Mightcap
description: You can now equip 2 Ultimate skills, and all Ultimate skills are  stronger.

name: Harp
description: Rapid Shot, Charged Arrow, Poison Shot, and Frost Arrow shoot  arrows in a cone.

name: Phantom
description: Sword skills launch a Phantom Blade on attack, dealing  of the used skill's damage to all foes in a straight line. The Blade is of the same element as the skill used, and may trigger other on-hit effects.

name: Death Speaker
description: All Curses that do not have a damage over time effect now deal an additional  of the total remaining damage of all curse damage over time effects on that foe. Hand of Death, Blood Curse, and Flesh Rot now stack infinitely.

name: Face Breakers
description: Each attack adds a stack of Face Breaking, storing the 40% of the damage of the attack. At  stacks, the total damage is added to all attacks for 3 seconds.

name: Pure Energy
description: of Damage taken subtracted from Mana instead of Health, draining 1 Mana per 4 points of Damage.

name: Entity's Eccentricity
description: Satellites now deal direct damage, triggering on-hit effects. In addition, satellite damage is increased by .

name: Armor of Retribution
description: The damage of Soul Purge is multiplied by Light Radius.

name: Battle Boots
description: Mobility Skills increase Damage Reduction by  for 7 seconds when used.

name: Unwavering Loyalty
description: Companions gain  increased Evasion and Attack Speed.

name: Lusombra's Path
description: of Shadow Resistance is added to Holy Damage, however this bonus does not interact with other elements.

name: The Dancing Maiden
description: Hearty Dance also casts War Dance and Shield Dance.

name: The Elven Ranger
description: Archery Skills cost  less mana, have  less cooldown, and deal  increased damage.

name: Acrobat's Slippers
description: Tumble, Escape, Agility, and Sprint have their cooldown and mana cost reduced by .

name: Boots of The Snow Elf
description: Winter Blast no longer has a knockback effect, and casts Flash Freeze when landing.

name: Trapper's Boots
description: Trapflip and Lay Traps deal  increased damage.

name: Winter's Coming
description: Winter increases Frost damage by an additional  and applies Winter's Chill to all foes within 5 meters when triggered.

name: Druid's Scroll of Storms
description: Storm Skills attack with  increased attack speed.

name: Blazing Stride
description: While moving, increases the damage of Blaze by  of Movement Speed every half second, stacking 10 times. Fades away slowly while not moving.

name: Murmur
description: 10% chance on being hurt to cast a random Curse at the attacker, and all Curses last  longer.

name: Jotunhelm
description: of Health Regeneration is converted into Damage, however all Health Regeneration is removed.

name: The Bone Spear
description: Bone Spears instead fires  piercing Bone Spears in a cone forwards, dealing Thorns damage but no longer pulling foes towards the Warlock. In addition, it no longer has a cooldown.

name: The Boomstick
description: Combustion deals  increased damage for each remaining second of Flaming Hells.

name: The Darkwalkers
description: Soul Warp no longer consumes any Souls, and always acts as if consuming the max amount.

name: Demonology
description: Imps, Little Devils, and Infernal Demon have their base damage increased by  of the Warlock's bonus damage to Demons.

name: Static Echoes
description: Soul Avatar and Soul Replication deal  increased damage for each active Static Overload orb.

name: Jon's Book of Souls
description: Maximum Souls. Souls stolen while already at Maximum Souls will now hover around the Warlock until the Warlock has room to hold more Souls or there are 5 Souls hovering.

name: Robe of Corruption
description: Health Regeneration is increased by  for each application of Infection on all foes within 7 meters.

name: Iceheart
description: Frozen Veil can stack one more time per Soul held.

name: The Art of Combat
description: All Base Skills attack in  directions.

name: Frostborn Heirloom
description: Rage Release no longer deals damage and instead provides a protective barrier, shielding the Berserker for 1% of his Maximum Health for every 3 Rage consumed by the skill. Barrier lasts  seconds or until broken.

name: Staggering Boots
description: of damage taken is staggered and dealt over 3 seconds, at a 30% damage reduction.

name: Hound Whistle
description: Grants a friendly Hellhound companion with  Fire damage.

name: Mollug's One Ring
description: Grants an annoying Goblin companion (whether you like it or not) with  Physical damage.

name: Soulblade
description: Adds a 5% chance on attack to summon a random Ghost companion with  Lightning damage. Companion lasts for 15 seconds.

name: Knowledge
description: Adds  Bonus Experience on each kill, stacking up to 100 times and lasts until an item of Unique or higher quality drops.

name: Windflurry
description: Double Draw now triggers from Storm skills, shooting Gusts instead of arrows. Double Draw also has a  additional chance to trigger.

name: Finned Arrow
description: Seeking Arrow strikes an addtional  times and deals 40% increased damage.

name: Advancing Army
description: of Movement Speed is added to Companion Damage.

name: Supernova
description: All Nova skills deal  increased damage.

name: Tear of The Arch Druid
description: All indirect damage enchants such as Chain Lightning, Burn, Smite, etc. deal  increased damage.

name: Star of The Pure
description: All absorption barriers are  stronger.

name: Thorn Ring
description: Thorns.

name: Ragnarok Guard
description: Stoneskin also applies Dragonscales, and the effect of both skills is increased by

name: Molten Medallion
description: Lava Blood deals  increased damage for every 22 points of Mana Regeneration.

name: Vestige of Lost Souls
description: Drains 15% of Maximum Mana every 5 seconds to create a protective barrier absorbing damage equal to  times the mana drained. A new barrier is only created if it is stronger than the current one.

name: Wolf Tooth Necklace
description: Alpha Wolf and Wolfpack now cause a stacking bleed effect when dealing damage. The bleed damages for 100% of the damage dealt, per second, for 5 seconds. In addition, Alpha Wolf and Wolfpack deal  increased damage.

name: Firelord's Amulet
description: Hell Caller can now be triggered by any fire skill, and Demonic Appetite is  stronger if not having any active Companion Skills.

name: Loaded Bolts
description: Arrows fired from Double Draw now explode on impact, dealing damage in a 3 meter radius. Double Draw also deals  increased damage.

name: Call of the Wild
description: All of the Warden's companion skills that summon 2 or more companions summon  additional companions.

name: Gaia
description: For each active companion, Damage is increased by .

name: Heart of the Forest
description: Reduces the base cooldown of all skills by , and increases their base cost by twice as much.

name: Thistle Thorn
description: Nature Skills attack with  increased attack speed.

name: Lucilla's Vision
description: 10% of overhealing received from Health on Hit is turned into damage. The effect lasts 7 seconds and stacks up to  of Maximum Health.

name: Tenacious Defender
description: Every third Cleave attack also casts rank 5 Shield Spiral. In addition, the radius of Cleave is increased by . This sword also counts as a shield and allows blocking.

name: Captain's Shield
description: Phantom Shield deals  increased damage when triggered from a Shield skill cast.

name: Nemesis
description: Adds 0. to Thorns for every point of Health, Mana, and Damage.

name: Deceiver's Tongue
description: Curse skills attack  faster, cost  less mana, and deal  increased base damage.

name: Splinter Skull
description: Bone Splinters may now be triggered from any Bone skill. In addition, all Bone skills deal  increased damage.

name: Gritstone
description: Stoneskin now provides immunity to poison and bleed effects while active. In addition, all Stone skills deal  increased damage.

name: Balgar's Binding
description: Damage is increased by  of the currently held Staggered Damage.

name: Council's Gavel
description: Blade Conjuration skills now count as Hammer skills and will conjure great hammers instead of blades. In addition, all Hammer skills deal an increased  damage.

name: Spooky
description: Spooky

name: Dragonring
description: Damage taken from burn effects now triggers Molten Veins. Molten Veins' damage is increased by  for each percentage of health lost from any damage taken that triggers the effect.

name: Hydraloop
description: chance on attack to cast rank 5 Magma Hydra, dealing fire damage.

name: Ring of Blades
description: Dancing Blades now attack the target of any Blade Conjuration skills used by the Templar by mimicking the skill at  efficiency in addition to their own attacks. The mimicked skills use the companions' own stats and bonuses instead of the Templar's.

name: Hammerblade
description: 5% chance on attack to cast rank 5 Hammer Storm. In addition, Hammer skills deal  increased damage and attack  faster.

name: Elegance
description: When evading an attack, there is a 10% chance to spawn a Health or Mana pickup. Adds  to Evasion.

name: Lone Ranger
description: Archery, Storm, and Nature skills deal  increased damage per meter distance to the foe hit, however this requires that the Warden has no active companions.

name: Hazard
description: Standing in hostile ground effects triggers Health on Hit. Take  less damage from Ground Effects.

name: The Thumper
description: Grants a Sandworm companion with  Physical damage.

name: Fang of Alucard
description: Health on Hit is  more effective.

name: Ancient Bone
description: Bone Skills deal  increased damage. (Warlock only)

name: Skull of Harlon
description: Projectile skills have  increased range and damage.

name: Eye of Hazioxth
description: Reveal all invisible foes within  meters.

name: Molten Skin Boots
description: Ground Effect Skills deal  increased damage and last  longer.

name: Ring of Hunger
description: Mana Regeneration is increased by  for each foe within 7 meters. Bosses count as 15 foes.

name: Shizbuk's Tail
description: Provoke and pull a random nearby foe when attacking.

name: Stone of Tephra
description: Thrown skills and Stone (Berserker) skills deal  increased damage.

name: Fungimancer's Loop
description: Fungi skills deal  increased damage. Spores spawned from Fungi skills are twice as strong.

name: Grimm
description: Bane spells deal  increased damage for every 5% Reach.

name: Simulacra
description: Sorcery spells are sometimes duplicated by a magical clone of the Warlock, casting from a random nearby location towards the same target, for  increased damage. 25% chance to cast.

name: Death's Bond
description: Curse of Woe, Curse of Terror, and Curse of Reckoning are now all cast once per second at the Warlock's location. The Warlock only needs to equip one of these skills to gain the effect of all of them. In addition, these skills deal  increased damage.

name: Haymaker
description: Brawl skills have a 50% chance to strike up to 2 additional times at random nearby enemies for  increased damage. Mobility skills are unaffected.

name: Moe's Fury
description: Fists of Fury now throws fists, traveling up to 7 meters. Fists of Fury also deals  increased damage and is considered a Thrown skill.

name: Screaming Skull
description: Screaming Skull no longer spirals the Warlock and instead bounces up to  times between foes.

name: The Last Word
description: Shout skills deal up to  increased damage the closer the foes are to the Berserker. In addition, Shout skills have 50% increased range.

name: Aspect of the Ethereal
description: All indirect damage enchants apply a debuff dealing the same amount of damage per second as Ethereal, stacking infinitely and lasting 7 seconds.

name: Contra
description: Each time a foe is struck by a Shield skill they suffer  increased damage from all Shield skills, stacking infinitely.

name: Venerata
description: Magic skills attack  faster and have 25% chance to doublecast.

name: Ancient Claw of The Firstborn
description: Dragon skills attack  faster, have  less cooldown, and last  longer.

name: Prayer Beads
description: While still, Auras have  increased range. While moving, Auras have  increased effect & damage.

name: Talisman of Spines
description: For each assigned skill that is Utility, Ultimate, Companion, Aura, Heritage, or Ritual, thorns is increased by .

name: Crown of Innate Probability
description: All Skills with any chance effects, proc rates, etc, have a  increased chance to trigger.

name: Mantle of the Dragonkin
description: For each nearby foe, maximum rage is increased by 3. Rage-based passive skills are  stronger. Bosses count as 15 foes.

name: Multishot
description: Multi Shot, Scatter Shot, and Volley fire  additional arrows/fragments.

name: Slicing
description: Slice, Charge, and Tackle, moves only half the distance, and mana cost and cooldown is reduced by .

name: Rage Smash
description: Rock Smash consumes up to  Rage when used, increasing its base damage by 2% per point of Rage consumed.

name: Cursed Blood
description: Living Blood is  stronger when spawned from foes affected by Blood Curse.

name: Rolling Thunder
description: Rolling Thunder has a  additional chance to trigger.

name: Mega Charged
description: Charged Up increases Damage by an additional .

name: Boomspore
description: Boom Shrooms will instantly burst any Shrooms spawned from Spores when cast. The Shrooms will burst regardless of growth stage and deal  increased damage.

name: Infinite Ruin
description: Ruin now stacks infinitely.

name: Scorching Blaze
description: Scorch now always triggers Flare, and Blaze is  stronger when triggered from Scorch.

name: Dragon Stomp
description: Dragon Stomp now interrupts attacks and stuns foes for up to  seconds.

name: Chained Focus
description: All Chained skills now deal  of the total remaining damage spread across all foes struck if the effect ends before performing all jumps.

name: Demonic Fury
description: Demonic Fury has a  additional base damage and increased chance to trigger for each active companion.

name: Storming Hammers
description: Hammer Storm has a  chance on each foe hit to spawn an additional hammer.

name: Infinite Rolls
description: The cooldown of Dive, Flame Roll, and Glacial Roll is reduced by .

name: Shardstorm
description: Ice Shard has a  chance to also cast Winter Storm on itself.

name: Reaping
description: Life Reap no longer has a cooldown and deals  increased damage for each Curse of Woe, Curse of Terror, or Curse of Reckoning the foe is affected by.

name: Blazing Hammers
description: Holy Fire now casts  fire versions of Hammer Storm on each tick instead of dealing damage in a radius.

name: Phantom Shield
description: Phantom Shield bounces up to  additional times.

name: Barbed Revenge
description: Revenge now bases the damage of Phantom Shield on Thorns rather than the damage blocked, and will always deal the damage as Physical, regardless of thorns element.

name: Static Repulse
description: Repulse, Revert, and Magnetic Lock now also destroy all Static Overload orbs when used, causing them to burst, dealing  of their damage to all foes within twice their damage radius.

name: The Living Forest
description: Treant Guard also summons Treant Strider, and the other way around. In addition, both companions have their damage and thorns stats increased by .

name: Bramble Burst
description: Vine Blast, Vine Shot, Bramble Storm, and Bramble Vine have a  chance to cause any Pods on foes hit to burst.

name: Thorn Veil
description: Root Veil also increases Thorns by  while active.

name: Split Thunder
description: Thunder Orb now splits into 3 smaller orbs on impact, each dealing  of the orb's damage in half of its radius. One of the orbs will attempt to target a random nearby foe, whereas the others will move randomly.

name: Poison Trees
description: Treant Guard and Treant Strider may now trigger the Barbed Spores Mastery Perk at  efficiency on themselves, provided that they also have the Thorny passive skill.

name: Light's Aura
description: Prayer, Hymn, and Plea now restore 1% of Maximum Health per second and increase Light Radius by .

name: Hallowed Grace
description: Adds x the strength of the Templar's current barriers to the base damage of Hallowed.

name: Hydrarage
description: Magma Hydra now attaches itself to the back of the Berserker, and deals 1% increased damage for each point of Rage. Magma Hydra also has its duration increased by  seconds, but is limited to a single instance.

name: Embershield
description: Embershield may now trigger on-hit effects and increases Mana Regeneration by  while active.

name: Companion Mobility
description: Melee companions gain the Leaper affix, and ranged companions gain the Warping affix.

name: Lethal Mobility
description: Mobility Skills increase the damage of all non-Mobility Skills used in the next 3 seconds by .

name: Shattering Impact
description: Leap and Take Down cause Earthshatter of the same rank on impact.

name: Dragonthorn
description: Thorns damage turns into Lightning, and taking damage spawns a Dragon Soul using  of Thorns as its base damage.

name: Hard Knocks
description: The cooldown of Take Down, Explosive Punch, and Thunder Punch is reduced by .

name: Released Heritage
description: Rage Release increases Heritage Effect by 5% for 5 seconds after triggering, stacking up to  times.

name: Ravenous Winds
description: Increases the tick rate of Frost Winds by  of Attack Speed.

name: The Fierce Avenger
description: Avenger always lands a critical hit, and deals  increased damage while the Templar is moving.

name: Critical Thorns
description: Critical hits increase Thorns by  for 7 seconds, stacking 15 times.

name: Chilled Blood
description: Chilled foes suffer  increased damage from bleed effects.

name: Infected Wounds
description: Bleeding foes suffer  increased damage from poison effects.

name: Winter's Chill
description: Winter's Chill is applied to all foes within  meters when casting any Frost skill.

name: Curse of Thorns
description: Foes afflicted by Curse of Reckoning instead suffer  increased Thorns damage from the Warlock.

name: Exoskeleton
description: Exoskeleton also adds  Thorns for each stack of Masochism, and Thorns damage is now dealt as a bone nova to all foes within 7 meters while Exoskeleton is active.

name: The Reckoning Hand
description: Hand of Death applies Curse of Reckoning to all foes hit, and foes afflicted by Curse of Reckoning instead suffer  increased Thorns damage from the Warlock.

name: Warped Banes
description: Soul Warp also casts either Bane of the Dead, Fire Nova, Frost Nova, or Bone Spears at max rank when landing. The Warlock's highest Elemental damage decides the skill cast.

name: Foul Demon
description: All active Imps and Little Devils are sacrificed, adding  of their total combined Health and Damage to Infernal Demon.

name: Rapid Plague
description: Plague now strikes faster, based on  of the Warlock's attack speed, but is limited to a single instance.

name: Shattered Spirits
description: When triggered, Corpse Shatter spawns  Spirit of Torment based on its damage.

name: Wisp Blast
description: Shock Orb and Storm Orbs are also fired from any active Wisp when cast. The skill will target what the Wisp targets.

name: Burning Lightning
description: Burning foes suffer  increased damage from Lightning attacks

name: Greater Hail
description: Hail has a  chance to create a Greater Hail, dealing damage in a 2 meter radius.

name: Trap Throw
description: Lay Traps now throws a single trap at the target foe rather than laying them on the ground. The trap deals  increased damage to a  wider radius. In addition, the element of the trap matches the highest bonus element stat. Lay Traps now counts as a Thrown skill.

name: Advanced Toxicology
description: Mushrooms spawned from Fairy Ring and Toxicology now stack their poison effects infinitely and the effects last  longer.

name: Pulverize
description: If Stonefist hits a crowned foe it will strike an additional  times.

name: Boulderfist
description: Boulder has a  chance on hit to summon a Stonefist over the foe and no longer causes a knockback.

name: Retaliating Companions
description: Companions are granted Thorns equal to  of their Maximum Health.

name: Rapid Pyre
description: Pyre now lasts 1.5 seconds but spews as many Embers as if lasting  seconds.

name: Bloodscent
description: Companions deal  increased damage to bleeding foes.

name: Warp Echo
description: Dragon Warp creates a Warp Echo when used, which has a  chance to replicate any Shout Skills used by the Berserker. The Warp Echo lasts until Dragon Warp is used again.

name: Great Storms
description: Tornado, Toxic Storm, Thunder Storm, and Hail Storm have their tick rates increased by  of the Warden's attack speed.

name: Assertion
description: All doublecast passive skills have a  increased chance to trigger.

name: Simplicity
description: All Base Skills deal  increased damage.

name: Grand Reprisal
description: The passive effect of Reprisal, Retribution and Retaliation is increased by .

name: The Dragon Flame
description: Embershield, Flame Roll, and Flamewrath deal  increased damage and have no cooldown. However, these skills apply a burn effect to the Berserker, dealing 1% of his total health per second, stacking 10 times. Burn lasts 7 seconds.

name: Potency
description: All Active skills deal  increased damage for each percentage of Mana they cost to cast.

name: Frozen Graves
description: Foes affected by Frozen Fate have a 0. chance per missing health percentage to instantly die and cause Corpse Shatter when struck by a frost skill.

name: The Devouring Star
description: Deathly Barrage now only spawns a single powerful star with the damage of the original number of stars combined. This new star periodically absorbs any Frigid Star within 4 meters, refreshing its own duration and gaining  of the absorbed spell's damage. In addition, Deathly Barrage lasts 3 seconds longer.

name: Wolfcaster
description: Air Freeze and Ice Shard now summon charging wolves instead. Ice Shard summons a single charging Alpha Wolf, and Air Freeze summons multiple charging Wolfpack wolves. The Wolves dissolve after charging a short distance and will damage anything they touch. Their damage is based on  of Alpha Wolf and Wolfpack's listed damage.

name: Swelling Pods
description: Pods no longer deal damage in a radius when bursting, and instead adds  stacks to itself. The base damage of Pods is also doubled.

name: Norla's Gale
description: Gale now orbits the Warden and lasts for 7 seconds. Each cast refreshes the duration. Any Gust or Tornado cast will also spawn from each Gale, and deal  increased damage.

name: Barraging Acrobatics
description: Volley is now automatically performed when using Tumble or Escape, and deals  increased damage. However, it is no longer nearly as accurate and will spread arrows in all directions.

name: Mega Wisp
description: Mega Wisp is  stronger and Empowered Wisp stacks 10 more times.

name: Sparking Static
description: For each active Sparkies, Static deals  increased total damage, including Stormcaller's Regalia Set bonuses.

name: The Bombardier
description: Bombardment skills deal  increased damage for each second of duration, however their base durations are halved. Bombardment skills without any duration are treated as if having a 3 second duration for this effect.

name: Relentless Assault
description: Assault skills no longer cost any mana, restore 3% mana on use, and have their cooldowns reduced by .

name: The Sentry
description: Sentry skills deal  increased damage and last  longer, but have their damage radius halved.

name: Total Armageddon
description: Armageddon has  additional chance to trigger.

name: Instant Combustion
description: Detonation no longer deals damage and instead triggers Combustion on all foes affected by Flaming Hells. In addition, Combustion deals  increased damage.

name: Putrefying Poisons
description: All Corruptor skills now apply both Blood Curse and Flesh Rot at max rank to all foes struck. These effects also deal  increased damage.

name: Blood Explosion
description: Casting Poison Nova will make any Living Blood (or Clots) instantly explode for  increased damage.

name: Rage Peak
description: Glacier now exhausts all rage when cast, increasing its damage by  per 5 points of rage.

name: Winter Rage
description: Glacial Roll, Arctic Leap, and Frigid Roar generate twice as much rage on hit, and deal  increased damage.

name: The Blue Bolt
description: Dive and Hop casts Dragon Storm at rank 5 when used. Dragon Storm deals  increased damage.

name: Soulstorm
description: Dragon Soul spawned from Dragon Storm deal  increased damage.

name: Bouncing Throws
description: Thrown skills that are thrown in an arc and hit the ground may now bounce up to  times, moving a short distance and dealing damage on each bounce.

name: Splitting Throws
description: Thrown skills that are not thrown in an arc may now split, throwing up to  additional copies of themselves in random directions.

name: Ancestral Rage
description: All rage-based passive skills & Heritage effects now always give a minimum of  of the effect, regardless of current rage level.

name: Targeted Destruction
description: Destructive Manoeuvres now attempts to target a random enemy within range, and will apply a stacking burn effect to all foes struck, dealing  of the damage dealt, per second, for 5 seconds.

name: Holy Chains
description: Cinderblast and Holy Bolt are now Chained skills, dealing  increased damage and jumping up to 4 times.

name: Provocation
description: Foes affected by Taunt take  increased damage.

name: Polished Gems
description: All gems provide  to elemental damage in their respective elements, regardless of shape or quality.

name: Holy Expulsion
description: Expulsion deals  increased damage when triggered from Holy Nova hits.

name: Thundering Avatars
description: Soul Avatar has  increased attack speed and cooldown reduction on its attacks, and summons an additional Avatar.

name: Brutal Attacks
description: Damage is increased by  for each percentage attack speed below 150%. Any percentage below 100% attack speed grants twice this bonus.

name: Greatness
description: Greater Rune cap is increased by 1.

name: Crown of Solitude
description: damage vs. Crowned foes.

name: Primordial Rose
description: Every 3 seconds, resistance to a random element is increased by  for 3 seconds.

name: Terra's Binding
description: to all Resistances and all Elements.

name: Rimeheart
description: Rime deals  increased damage and has 2 meters increased base range.

name: Frozen Anger
description: Minimum Rage.

name: Paingrinder
description: Thorns and Bleed damage increased by .

name: Drakehoof
description: Dragon Stomp, Earthshatter, and Icicles deal  increased damage.

name: Gemstone Tiara
description: Any gem socketed into this helm also provides the bonuses from being socketed into a weapon and jewelry slot.

name: Stormchasers
description: Damage increased by  for each twister, gust, whirlwind and similar type of effect within 5 meters.

name: Faith
description: Using an Aura will cause a nova dealing  damage in the element of the Aura. This damage is multiplied by Aura Effect. May trigger on-hit effects.

name: Contender
description: While within 5 meters of any Crowned foe, Damage Reduction, Block Chance, and Damage is increased by .

name: Sniper Eye
description: Foes struck by Archery skills become weakened, increasing the damage they take by .

name: Community
description: Crystals found and Experience gained from all sources.

name: Cosmic
description: of Maximum Mana is converted into twice as much Damage.

name: Divine Link
description: increased Healing from all sources.
